DOC.brief_summary: To document practice Canadian ICD implant centre around defibrillation therapy efficacy test .
DOC.brief_title: Canadian Registry ICD Implant Testing Procedures
DOC.detailed_description: To document type defibrillation testing ( DFT ) procedures current use Canada , rate use dno use DFT testing , medical indication non use DFT testing , rate successful test first lead configuration , rate type complication DFT testing , cost implant procedure cost associate DFT testing , short term outcomes patient different type implant procedure .
DOC.criteria: Receiving Guidant ICD system , include replacement New epicardial lead ( ) implant , include another cardiovascular trial ( may ELECTION Study )
